Reviews.Title: Great product. It comes with everything
Reviews.Author: CAlpizar
Reviews.Content: Great product, it comes with everything I could need for camera and it is a great camera. It really is a bargain.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!!!
Reviews.Author: Memaw 43
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!!  THE VIDEO AND PICS ARE CRYSTAL CLEAR AND WE ENJOYED USING IT ON CHRISTMAS MORNING.  GAVE TO MY DAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS PRESENT AND SHE IS HAS NOT PUT IT DOWN SINCE SHE GOT IT.  IT HAS EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO SHOOT  YOUR FAVORITE SHOTS...DON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT RUNNING TO THE STORE AND BUYING ANYTHING FOR THIS CAMERA--IT IS THE COMPLETE PACKAGE.  WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Briana Ramirez
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my in-laws! They absolutely loved it! Comes with eveything it says and its a nice camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Swit
Reviews.Content: this is a very nice camera, with lots of extras. Well worth the price! No complaints, have owned it for 4 months now.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a very good price
Reviews.Author: Edward J. Peckham
Reviews.Content: Great purchase at a awesome price. All the extras made it even a better value. We bought it for videos and are not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and kit!!!
Reviews.Author: hilary danch
Reviews.Content: Awesome kit for the money. You get everything you need in this kit. The camera takes amazing pictures. The timer definitely gives you enough time to take family or group pictures. I couldn't be more happy with this camera set. It got here right on time. I'm going to be buying another one for my son because he takes mine. The color quality of the pictures is gorgeous.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500
Reviews.Author: Dan Stinson
Reviews.Content: Great Package! Had more than everything I needed. The camera is awesome. Still shots or Video. Easy to use nothing to figure out. Would buy again

Reviews.Title: ALL-IN-ONE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Julia Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera gets 5 stars because it comes with everything you need in one kit.  I like it because the price is reasonable.  I would recommend this to anyone who wants a camera this size and with everything with it.  The seller is good to buy from and does what they need when it comes to satisfying the customer.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Great Price
Reviews.Author: Ellen K. Seiders
Reviews.Content: I use this for my ebay business.  Its not fancy but it sure does the job both close up and farther shots.  the Tripod is small and nice for my table top photos.  I got it at an insanely low price.  double reduced  so I couldn't pass it up.  Not sure why but mine came with 2 batteries, 2 tripods and 2 memory cards.  One set was "in the camera box" and the other was outside the camera box..  Anyway great deal.  A solid camera for everyday use

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 MP sensor with DIGIC 4 Image Processor
5x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens with Digital IS to reduce camera shake
Smart AUTO with 32 predefined shooting modes
720p HD video recording with a dedicated movie button
New ECO Mode to reduce power consumption
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video Recording (Black) + 16GB Memory Card + Universal Memory Card Reader + Kit
